thread.title: Win a Rouleur prize worth over £400
thread.title_full: Win a Rouleur prize worth over £400 - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Win a Rouleur prize worth over £400
text: The Telegraph is delighted to be partnering with premium cycling magazine, Rouleur, to present the inaugural Rouleur Classic: The Road Cycling Emporium in association with Maserati at Vinopolis, London this November. Celebrating the best of road cycling, the event promises a unique insight inside the peloton, featuring the finest brands, cycling luminaries including Maserati Cycling Ambassador David Millar and a large collection of WorldTour and heritage bicycles. Iconic bike brands currently signed up to the event include Colnago, Cannondale, Canyon and Trek, whilst the latest technology being utilised on the WorldTour will be showcased by Campagnolo, SRAM, Giro, Lazer and Reynolds. To celebrate the launch of the event, and the 2015 Tour de France, we are delighted to offer a fantastic prize courtesy of Rouleur Magazine worth over £400, including a one year subscription to the magazine, a special edition Tour de France Annual, a Mark Cavendish vinyl figure and a Rouleur notepad and t-shirt. To enter, simply answer the question below. The competition closes Sunday, August 9, 2015. Read full terms and conditions. Online Form - Win a Rouleur prize worth over £400 Follow @telegraph
